languages.text: Засада на Немезита окончилась кровавой баней, в которой полегло немало блюстителей. Мастеру дисциплины пришлось временно сократить количество патрульных в двигательных отсеках, что вызвало волнение экипажа.

traits.locale_text: Засада на Немезита окончилась кровавой баней, в которой полегло немало блюстителей. Мастеру дисциплины пришлось временно сократить количество патрульных в отсеках, что вызвало волнение экипажа.

languages.text: The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms was forced to reduce the number of patrols in the engines module temporarily, which caused disturbances among the crew.
languages.original_text: Засада на Немезита окончилась кровавой баней, в которой полегло немало блюстителей. Мастеру дисциплины пришлось временно сократить количество патрульных в двигательных отсеках, что вызвало волнение экипажа.

traits.locale_text: The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms was forced to reduce the number of patrols in the engines module temporarily, which caused disturbances among the crew.
The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms had to temporarily reduce the number of patrols in the compartments, which made the crew nervous.

The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms was forced to reduce the number of patrols in the engines module temporarily, which caused disturbances among the crew.

languages.text: Der Hinterhalt gegen Nemesit endete in einem Blutbad, bei dem viele Enforcer ums Leben kamen. Die Waffenmeisterin war gezwungen, die Zahl der Patrouillen im Triebwerksmodul vorübergehend zu reduzieren, was Unruhen unter der Crew zur Folge hatte.
languages.original_text: The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms was forced to reduce the number of patrols in the engines module temporarily, which caused disturbances among the crew.

traits.locale_text: Der Hinterhalt gegen Nemesit endete in einem Blutbad, bei dem viele Enforcer ums Leben kamen. Die Waffenmeisterin war gezwungen, die Zahl der Patrouillen im Triebwerksmodul vorübergehend zu reduzieren, was Unruhen unter der Crew zur Folge hatte.

languages.text: La emboscada contra Nemesitio acabó en un baño de sangre que se cobró las vidas de muchos guardias. La maestra de armas se vio obligada a reducir el número de patrullas en el módulo de motores temporalmente, lo que causó problemas entre la tripulación.
languages.original_text: The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms was forced to reduce the number of patrols in the engines module temporarily, which caused disturbances among the crew.

traits.locale_text: La emboscada contra Nemesitio acabó en un baño de sangre que se cobró las vidas de muchos guardias. La maestra de armas se vio obligada a reducir el número de patrullas en el módulo de motores temporalmente, lo que causó problemas entre la tripulación.

languages.text: ネメサイトに対する奇襲は、多くのエンフォーサーが死亡する大惨事となった。マスター・アット・アームはエンジンモジュール内の巡回数を一時的に減らすことを余儀なくされ、乗組員の間に不穏な空気が流れた。
languages.original_text: The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms was forced to reduce the number of patrols in the engines module temporarily, which caused disturbances among the crew.

traits.locale_text: ネメサイトに対する奇襲は、多くのエンフォーサーが死亡する大惨事となった。マスター・アット・アームはエンジンモジュール内の巡回数を一時的に減らすことを余儀なくされ、乗組員の間に不穏な空気が流れた。

languages.text: 针对涅墨斯特的伏击以流血冲突而告终，许多执法者不幸身亡。戒律大师不得不暂时减少在引擎区域巡逻的频率，这导致船员之中爆发了骚乱。
languages.original_text: The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms was forced to reduce the number of patrols in the engines module temporarily, which caused disturbances among the crew.

traits.locale_text: 针对涅墨斯特的伏击以流血冲突而告终，许多执法者不幸身亡。戒律大师不得不暂时减少在引擎区域巡逻的频率，这导致船员之中爆发了骚乱。

languages.text: L'embuscade, destinée à prendre Némésite au piège, s'est terminée dans un bain de sang qui a décimé les rangs des prévôts. La capitaine d'armes a été contrainte de réduire temporairement les patrouilles dans le module des moteurs. En conséquence, le nombre d'incidents parmi l'équipage a augmenté.
languages.original_text: The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms was forced to reduce the number of patrols in the engines module temporarily, which caused disturbances among the crew.

traits.locale_text: L'embuscade, destinée à prendre Némésite au piège, s'est terminée dans un bain de sang qui a décimé les rangs des prévôts. La capitaine d'armes a été contrainte de réduire temporairement les patrouilles dans le module des moteurs. En conséquence, le nombre d'incidents parmi l'équipage a augmenté.

languages.text: Nemezit'e karşı kurulan pusu, pek çok infazcının ölümüne neden olan bir kan gölüyle sonuçlandı. Silahtar, geçici bir süreliğine motor modüllerindeki mürettebat içinde huzursuzluk yaratan devriye sayısını azaltmak zorunda kaldı.
languages.original_text: The ambush against Nemesite ended in a bloodbath that left many enforcers dead. The Master-at-Arms was forced to reduce the number of patrols in the engines module temporarily, which caused disturbances among the crew.
